mapper.insert: insert into dish (status, name, category_id, price, image, description, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) VALUES (#{status}, #{name}, #{categoryId}, #{price}, #{image}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})
mapper.select: select d.*, df.name dfName, df.value from dish d left join dish_flavor df on d.id = df.dish_id where d.id = #{id}
